name: VIR-273.03 Verify that the colors check boxes are checked in by default to view all colors

userStory.narrative:
As a Chief shopper, I require the ability to manage the colors
that each school will be able to view and purchase on the shop.virco
so that I can control the consistency for the school.

title: VIR-273.03 Verify that the colors check boxes are checked in by default to view all colors
